name: hedera-hackathon-ai-theme
description: Hedera Hackathon AI Theme - Full Stack Application

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run env:setup
scripts.setup:full: npm run setup && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.dev: concurrently -n agents,backend,frontend,db -c bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgRed.bold "cd agents && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npx prisma studio"
scripts.start: concurrently -n agents,backend,frontend -c bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold "cd agents && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
